dcterms:creator: Giovanni Da San Martino
Seunghak Yu
Alberto Barrón-Cedeño
Rostislav Petrov
Preslav Nakov
dcterms:description: The corpus consists of 350 articles for training and 61 articles for development for a total of 411 articles in plain text format. The title is followed by an empty row and the content of the article starting from the next row, one sentence per line. There are 16975 sentences in the training data, where 12244 are non-propaganda and 4721 are propaganda.
dcterms:title: NLP4IF 2019 Task 1 Sentence Level Classification (SLC)

dcterms:creator: Shlok Gilda
dcterms:description: The dataset was produced by GitHub that contains 6335 training samples.
dcterms:title: Dataset produced by GitHub containing 6335 training samples
